select rd.id,rd.status as deliveryStatus,rd.create_time,c.nickname as companyNickname, c.logo as companyLogo, p.name as positionName,p.mini_salary,p.max_salary,p.job_place,p.education,p.status as positionStatus,p.id as positionId from t_resume_delivery as rd join t_position as p on rd.position_id = p.id join t_company as c on p.company_id = c.id
rd.status = #{status} and rd.user_id = #{userId} and rd.is_deleted = 0
order by rd.create_time desc

select sum(case when status = 0 then 1 else 0 end) as notViewedCount, sum(case when status = 1 then 1 else 0 end) as viewedCount, sum(case when status = 2 then 1 else 0 end) as interestedCount, sum(case when status = 3 then 1 else 0 end) as interviewCount from t_resume_delivery where user_id = #{userId}

select sum(case when rd.status = 0 then 1 else 0 end) as notViewedCount, sum(case when rd.status = 1 then 1 else 0 end) as viewedCount, sum(case when rd.status = 2 then 1 else 0 end) as interestedCount, sum(case when rd.status = 3 then 1 else 0 end) as interviewCount from t_resume_delivery as rd join t_position as p on rd.position_id = p.id where p.company_id = #{companyId}
